entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as being out and about, which is surprising according to Travers. ["Well, I confess I am surprised to see you out and about, Bellatrix."]

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having a good credit with the Dark Lord, which allows her to be out in public. ["Perhaps your credit is not as good with him as mine is, Travers."]

entities.name: travers
entities.description: Travers is mentioned as being a Death Eater and having a conversation with Hermione and Harry. ["Well," Travers coughed, "I heard that the Inhabitants of Malfoy Manor were conﬁned to the house, after the . . . ah . . . escape."]

entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: Malfoy Manor is mentioned as being confined to the house. ["Well," Travers coughed, "I heard that the Inhabitants of Malfoy Manor were conﬁned to the house, after the . . . ah . . . escape."]

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as having Stunned a man. ["He glanced down at the man Ron had just Stunned."]

relationships.description: Travers saw Bellatrix out and about, which is surprising according to Travers. ["Well, I confess I am surprised to see you out and about, Bellatrix."]
Hermione defended herself against Travers' accusation that she was not supposed to be out in public. ["Perhaps your credit is not as good with him as mine is, Travers."]
Ron Stunned a man. ["He glanced down at the man Ron had just Stunned."]
